title: Ep 27: Keeping up with Claudia Oshry
itunes:title: Ep 27: Keeping up with Claudia Oshry
description: Shannon and Claudia are absolutely obsessed with each other and here in NYC to declare it to the world. Live (lol not really) Preciously recorded from the iconic Toast Studio, the girls cover it all. They talk about the Oshry dog hierarchy and compare their lives growing up. Why did Shannon spend an extra week at camp? Who was Claudia’s first celebrity follower? How has Shannon not seen High School Musical? Ending this episode with an exciting announcement about the future of the podcast, buckle up toaster strudels. Listen to episode 14 to hear all the details.
